body: NPR has the latest on events as they continue to unfold in Paris in what officials fear is the worst attack in Europe since the Madrid train bombings in 2004.
description: NPR has the latest on events as they continue to unfold in Paris in what officials fear is the worst attack in Europe since the Madrid train bombings in 2004.
title: U.S., French Officials: Multiple Attacks In Paris Were 'Nearly Simultaneous'
